snippet: Residents in Newtown, Conn., attended the first of what might be several meetings to decide the future of the school building where 20 first graders and six staff members were killed.
abstract: Residents in Newtown, Conn, attend first of what might be several meetings to decide  future of the school building where 20 first graders and six staff members were killed; opinions vary sharply about whether to renovate school, turn it into shrine or park, or raze it.
lead_paragraph: Residents in Newtown, Conn., attended the first of what might be several meetings to decide the future of the school building where 20 first graders and six staff members were killed.

headline.seo: Newtown Debates the Fate of Sandy Hook Elementary
headline.main: Newtown Debates School’s Fate After Shooting
headline.print_headline: Newtown Debates Building’s Fate After Shooting
